description:
After being told by Coach Aoi to do only what he wants for two days and rest his body, Eiichiro ends up on a date with Natsu thanks to Kageyama`s quick wit. They enjoy a movie and karaoke together, but Eiichiro is unusually conscious of Natsu after being told by Kageyama to confess his feelings to her. When Eiichiro returns to training after his break, Coach Aoi suddenly suggests that he go to America.
Source: crunchyroll
